About Us

This website was founded in 2018 as a spin-off from EV3Lessons to create a high-quality, free resource for FIRST LEGO League teams to use. Our Mission is not to solve the challenges, but to provide the building blocks and tools to help you to achieve your goals. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
